policy.name: Build
policy.description: Policy to cover the life cycle of the Build

user.name: Public Add
user.filter: context.user == to[EC Affected Item].from.owner || context.user == to[EC Affected Item].from.to[Assigned EC].from.name || context.user == to[EC Implemented Item].from.owner || context.user == to[EC Implemented Item].from.to[Assigned EC].from.name || context.user == to[Reported Against EC].from.owner || context.user == to[Reported Against EC].from.to[Assigned EC].from.name

user.name: Public Read
user.filter: context.user == to[EC Affected Item].from.owner || context.user == to[EC Affected Item].from.to[Assigned EC].from.name || context.user == to[EC Implemented Item].from.owner || context.user == to[EC Implemented Item].from.to[Assigned EC].from.name || context.user == to[Reported Against EC].from.owner || context.user == to[Reported Against EC].from.to[Assigned EC].from.name

user.name: Product Manager
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' || program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_ProductManager] == true

user.name: System Engineer
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' || program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_SystemEngineer] == true
